title: Bucket Sort
subject: Algorithms
theory:
Distribute elements into 'buckets' based on value range. Sort each bucket (e.g., Insertion Sort). Concatenate buckets. 
Great for floating point numbers 0.0 - 1.0.
exam_notes: Worst case O(n^2) if all go to 1 bucket.
summary: Divide and conquer based on value range.
